virtual void brics_3d::IOctreeSetup::setVoxelSize ( double  voxelSize) [pure virtual]

Set the size of the maximum of smallest voxel in an Octree.

Parameters:
voxelSizeThe new voxel size. NOTE: the current implementation interprets voxelSize as the from the center to one of the cube faces.
